front.title: LDP Extensions for Source-initiated Point-to-Multipoint Pseudowire

abstract.t: This document provides a solution to extend Label Distribution Protocol (LDP) signaling in order to allow set up and maintenance of Point-to-Multipoint Pseudowire (P2MP PW). Such an extension of existing point to point Pseudowire is made necessary by new applications. The document deals with the source-initiated P2MP PW setup and maintenance.
